alert.note: Alert for Boone; Callaway; Cole; Moniteau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 8:42AM CDT until July 18 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cole County in central Missouri... Southern Boone County in central Missouri... Southwestern Callaway County in central Missouri... Moniteau County in central Missouri... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 842 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rocheport to near Tipton, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Jefferson City, Fulton, California, Ashland, Tipton, Holts Summit, Columbia Regional Airport, Wardsville, St. Martins, Taos, Russellville, New Bloomfield, Jamestown, Lake Mykee Town, Clarksburg, Centertown, St. Thomas, Rocheport, and Easley. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 131. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Clarks Hill/Norton Historic Site, Jewell Cemetery Historic Site, and Jefferson Landing Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
